mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1986 Season: Morning's at Seven
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the Barter Theatre 1986 Season. Productions include: Foreigner | Morning's at Seven by Paul Osborn. Directed by Ken Costigan | Ten Little Indians | Bedroom Farce | 'Night Mother.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
